channel.title: Changing Client Server ip! Help Please
channel.description:
Im using Near Hell 525's Client and server. The only problem l have ls that l cant find where the server ip is set so l can change it to my ip. I looked in Client.Java and and GUI.java and even login.java still cant find it
Please Help me

item.title: Changing Client Server ip! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @imodthings imodthings
item.description:
@imodthings wrote:

check in “class 68_sub_20_sub15.java” and it should be there like “127.0.0.1”

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Client Server ip! Help Please

item.title: Changing Client Server ip! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Mainly Comes in most sources/clients, Just download a 317 source PI, Almost all of them have it.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Client Server ip! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Download a File searcher then search all of these. 0.0.0.0 - 127.0.0.1 - no-ip
try all three of them.

Read full topic
